auth_sentence.content: Part of that experimentalism means, almost by necessity, embracing failure.

auth_sentence.content: Girls has seen a slow progression from cranky DIY experimentalism to a sort of self-taught virtuosity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Girls has seen a slow progression from cranky DIY experimentalism to a sort of self-taught virtuosity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Girls has seen a slow progression from cranky DIY experimentalism to a sort of self-taught virtuosity.

auth_sentence.content: But the genre-melting experimentalism is greater here, the music denser and the lyrics darker, than on their previous LPs.
